## Proposed Enhancement
What specific part of the codebase or UI should be improved?

## Why is this necessary?
Does this improve performance, readability, or maintainability? 

## Suggested Implementation
How do you envision this change being made? (Optional)

## Impact
What will be the measurable impact of this change?
